description.ko: 유기적 에너지와 생물 발광 빛으로 고동치는 심해의 생물학적 엔진으로, 유기적 흐름의 정수를 담고 있습니다.
description.en: A deep-sea biological engine pulsing with organic energy and bioluminescent light, capturing the essence of organic flow.

prompt: A microscopic, cinematic view of a celestial respiratory engine made of translucent #7FB069 emerald moss and #2D5A3D vascular networks, pulsing with rhythmic #FFE66D liquid light. The structure is suspended in a deep #2D5A3D underwater trench with #E6F2E1 floating bioluminescent spores. Intense subsurface scattering on the mossy membranes creates a soft, living glow. Rendered in Unreal Engine 5 with Octane Render, 8k resolution, hyper-realistic. Cinematic volumetric light shafts pierce through the dark water, highlighting the fluid flow of organic energy through the breathing light of nature.
